actionConfiguration.body:
UPDATE APS_CUSTOMER_ENTITY_PERSON_DETAILS
  SET   CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_ENTITY_TYPE = {{'Key Person India'}},
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_TYPE  = {{vaykeyPersonIndType.selectedOptionValue}},
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_IS_AUTH_SIGN = {{Checkbox1.isChecked}},
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_OTHERS_INFO = {{Input21.text}},
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_PARTNER_PERC = {{Input18.text}},
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_FIRSTNAME = {{Input1.text}},
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_MIDDLENAME = {{Input3.text}},
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_LASTNAME = {{Input4.text}},
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_MOTHERNAME  = {{Input5.text}},
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_FATHERNAME = {{Input6.text}},
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_DOB = {{moment(DatePicker1).format("YYYY-MM-DD")}},
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_TAX_ID  = {{Input7.text}},
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_NATIONALITY = {{Select3.selectedOptionValue}},
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_RES_TAX_PURPOSE = {{'IN'}}, --Select4.selectedOptionValue
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_DESIGNATION  = {{'Add Designation Field and Value'}},
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_PASSPORT_NO = {{Input22.text}},
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_PASSPORT_EXPIRE_DATE = {{moment(DatePicker1).format("YYYY-MM-DD")}},
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_ACCESS_AS = {{vayKeyPersonUserAccessRights.selectedOptionValue}},
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_DIN_DPIN  = {{Input8.text}},
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_ADDRESS_LINE1  = {{vayIndKeyPersonAddAddr1.text}},
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_ADDRESS_LINE2  = {{vayIndKeyPersonAddAddr2.text}},
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_ADDRESS_CITY  = {{vayIndKeyPersonAddCity.text}},
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_ADDRESS_DISTRICT  = {{vayIndKeyPersonAddDistrict.text}},
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_ADDRESS_STATE  = {{vayIndKeyPersonAddState.text}},
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_ADDRESS_COUNTRY = {{vayIndKeyPersonAddCountrySelec.selectedOptionValue}},
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_ADDRESS_ZIP = {{vayIndKeyPersonAddPinCode.text}},
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_MOBILE  = {{Input16.text}},
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_EMAIL   = {{Input17.text}}
WHERE OID = {{appsmith.store.editKeyPersonOID}}
AND CUSTOMER_OID = {{ appsmith.store.customerOID }}
AND CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_ENTITY_TYPE = {{'Key Person India'}}
